definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Japan is the big paradox in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 日本在亞洲是一大反例。

sentences.english: Case studies can also be quite powerful in providing demonstrations that are counterexamples to theories.
sentences.chinese: 個案研究也能夠給某一理論提供強有力的反例。
軟件行業會是一個反例嗎？

sentences.english: Finally a counter example shows that this method doesn't have symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 最後舉出反例說明它不具備對稱性。

sentences.english: This paper choice 10 very erotic and very violence website random for counter-examples.
sentences.chinese: 本文信手拈來十個很黃很暴力的網站，以作反例。

sentences.english: But finding counterexamples can, in general, weaken our confidence in our own arguments.
sentences.chinese: 然而找反例往往會弱化我們在爭辯時的自信。

sentences.english: It's not really a counterexample to the personality theory.
sentences.chinese: 不能作爲一個人格理論的反例。

sentences.english: Finally, a counterexample is presented to illustrate the conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 最後通過一個反例對結論予以驗證。

sentences.english: Can anyone give a counter example?
All right. So that is an anti-example of using periodic trends.
sentences.chinese: 好的，這是一個關於使用元素週期律的反例。

sentences.english: Is this a counterexample to the utilitarian idea of calculating?
sentences.chinese: 這算是功利主義計算思路的反例嗎？

sentences.english: There are holdouts, in parts of the Middle East and rural Africa.
sentences.chinese: 當然也有反例，主要是在中東和非洲農村。

sentences.english: Sometimes the best way to illustrate how to do something is by counterexample.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，說明如何做某事的最好方法是舉反例。

sentences.english: Also you have the option of writing your own counterexample paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用一個獨立的段落來寫反例。

definition: conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
